body_html:
aaaah. A very similar error to what I go while installing tensorflow from pre-compiled binaries with cuda9.2 and cudn7.x
tensorflow/tensorflow#16750 (comment)

The issue is the frameworks are all last supporting CUDA9.0/9.1
with cuda 9.2 it's unable to find that file.

I did solve the issue there by installing the cuda 9.0 sdk along with the 9.2 driver. (for tf it is hardcoded for cuda 9.0)
You could try installing the cuda 9.1 sdk, (normal installation script, but when it asks for installing the driver say no)
body_text:
aaaah.  A very similar error to what I go while installing tensorflow from pre-compiled binaries with cuda9.2 and cudn7.x
tensorflow/tensorflow#16750 (comment)
The issue is the frameworks are all last supporting CUDA9.0/9.1
with cuda 9.2 it's unable to find that file.
I did solve the issue there by installing the cuda 9.0 sdk along with the 9.2 driver. (for tf it is hardcoded for cuda 9.0)
You could try installing the cuda 9.1 sdk, (normal installation script, but when it asks for installing the driver say no)
body:
aaaah.  A very similar error to what I go while installing tensorflow from pre-compiled binaries with cuda9.2 and cudn7.x  
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/16750#issuecomment-394934998


The issue is the frameworks are all last supporting CUDA9.0/9.1 
with cuda 9.2 it's unable to find that file. 

I did solve the issue there by installing the cuda 9.0 sdk along with the 9.2 driver. (for tf it is hardcoded for cuda 9.0) 
You could try installing the cuda 9.1 sdk, (normal installation script, but when it asks for installing the driver say no)
